lexUnit.name: sentence.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the punishment assigned to a defendant found guilty by a court.

sentence.text: Britain has proportionately the largest prison population of any Community country -- and we also have more prisoners serving life sentences than the rest of the EC combined .
